column4: 4:30 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. - 3 lanes inbound / 1 lane outbound.
10:30 p.m. to 1:00 a.m. - 1 lane inbound / 3 lanes outbound.
No outbound left turns to Alumni Dr.
Alumni Dr is ONE WAY from the stadium to Nicholasville Rd.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: All traffic from the stadium must turn right onto Tates Creek Rd.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: Outbound Tates Creek traffic coming from Cooper Dr must turn left onto Alumni Dr.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: Inbound left turn from Tates Creek to Alumni Dr is closed.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: Alumni Dr is ONE WAY from the stadium to Nicholasville Rd.
Waller Ave is one way from Nicholasville Rd to Harrodsburg Rd.
Cooper Dr is one way from the stadium to Tates Creek Rd.
